message.content:
请详细探索 /web 目录的结构，包括：
1. src目录下的主要子目录及其用途
2. pages目录的组织方式（特别是pollo.ai和viggle.dance）
3. 各个子目录的职责和内容
4. 关键配置文件
5. 公共组件、工具、样式的组织方式

请提供一个清晰的目录结构说明。

content.text:
Perfect! Now I have enough information to provide a comprehensive directory structure overview. Let me compile the findings:

## Comprehensive Web Directory Structure Overview

### **1. Root Configuration Files**

```
/web/
├── tsconfig.json              # TypeScript config (extends parent tsconfig)
├── next.config.ts             # Next.js configuration (v15 with App Router + Pages Router)
├── tailwind.config.ts          # Tailwind CSS v4 configuration
├── postcss.config.js          # PostCSS configuration
├── package.json               # Dependencies & scripts (uses pnpm@10.14.0)
├── lingui.config.ts           # i18n configuration
├── i18n.config.ts             # i18n setup
├── components.json            # Component registry config
├── auto-imports.d.ts          # Auto-imported modules (React hooks, project hooks, utilities)
├── shims.d.ts                 # Global type shims
├── reset.d.ts                 # CSS reset definitions
├── streamsaver.d.ts           # StreamSaver types
├── next-env.d.ts              # Next.js auto-generated types
├── coco-server.config.ts       # Server configuration
└── turbo.json                 # Monorepo turbo configuration
```

---

### **2. Source Directory Structure (`/web/src/`)**

#### **Core Directories:**

| Directory | Purpose | Key Contents |
|-----------|---------|--------------|
| **pages** | All page routes (Next.js Pages Router & App Router) | See detailed structure below |
| **components** | 50+ shared reusable components across the app | UI primitives, forms, media, utilities |
| **_blocks** | 9 fundamental provider/layout blocks | AbTestProvider, Analytics, Auth, Managements, Plan |
| **hooks** | 10+ custom React hooks | Audio, forms, user preferences, requests |
| **helpers** | 8 utility helper directories | CMS, formatting, headers, proxy, server data |
| **contexts** | 8 global context providers | Antd, Auth, Plan, Site-specific contexts |
| **utils** | Shared utility functions | API calls, error handling, generation task links |
| **types** | Shared TypeScript types | Global, input type definitions |
| **styles** | Global stylesheets | SCSS, Tailwind CSS variables |
| **assets** | Static assets | Icons, SVGs, Figma exports |
| **layouts** | Page layout components | Base, antd, error, csr, site-specific layouts |
| **coco-react** | Custom React library (internal) | Components, hooks, libraries, analytics |
| **config** | Configuration modules | i18n, Next.js, redirects, rewrites, Tailwind |
| **contexts** | Global React contexts | Antd, Auth, Plan, Site contexts |
| **constants** | Global constants | Form configs, theme definitions |
| **hoc** | Higher-order components | Component wrappers |
| **events** | Event handling utilities | Custom event dispatchers |
| **window** | Window/browser utilities | Browser-specific helpers |

---

### **3. Pages Directory (`/web/src/pages/`)**

#### **Multi-Site Architecture:**

The application supports multiple branded sites with shared code:

```
pages/
├── pollo.ai/                    # Main AI video platform
│   ├── index.page.tsx           # Home page
│   ├── _blocks/                 # Pollo-specific blocks (agents, modals, headers)
│   ├── _components/             # 97 pollo-specific components
│   ├── _hooks/                  # 62 custom hooks (generation, models, templates)
│   ├── _helpers/                # 32 helper utilities
│   ├── _constant/               # 12 constants (models, resources, templates)
│   ├── _context/                # Form context, Inflow query context
│   ├── _layout/                 # Header, Footer, FooterTab layouts
│   ├── _styles/                 # figma-theme.ts, theme.module.scss
│   ├── _types/                  # Type definitions
│   ├── _store/                  # State management
│   ├── _ai-video-extender/      # AI video extension utilities
│   ├── _legacy-fallback-pages/   # Backward compatibility pages
│   │
│   ├── app/                     # New App Router implementation
│   │   ├── account/
│   │   ├── ai-agent/
│   │   ├── managements/
│   │   ├── refer/
│   │   ├── _components/
│   │   ├── _constants/
│   │   ├── _hooks/
│   │   ├── _layouts/
│   │   ├── _store/
│   │   ├── _types/
│   │   ├── _utils/
│   │   ├── _home/
│   │   └── layout.tsx
│   │
│   └── [Feature Pages] ~90 directories including:
│       ├── home/                # Home page with canvas editor
│       ├── ai-image-generator/  # Image generation tool
│       ├── text-to-video/       # Text→Video creation
│       ├── video-to-video/      # Video→Video transformation
│       ├── image-to-video/      # Image→Video generation
│       ├── image-tools/         # Image editing tools
│       ├── ai-avatar/           # Avatar generation
│       ├── ai-effects/          # Video effects
│       ├── mimic-motion/        # Motion capture
│       ├── video-studio/        # Video editing studio
│       ├── chat-to-image/       # Chat-based image gen
│       ├── explore/             # Content exploration
│       ├── settings/            # User settings
│       ├── profile/             # User profile
│       ├── my-projects/         # User projects
│       ├── your-creations/      # User creations
│       ├── template/            # Template gallery
│       ├── pricing/             # Pricing page
│       ├── sign-in/ & sign-up/  # Authentication
│       ├── privacy-policy/      # Legal pages
│       ├── terms-and-conditions/
│       ├── refund-policy/
│       └── ... [40+ more pages]
│
├── viggle.dance/                # Secondary branded site
│   ├── index.page.tsx
│   ├── _blocks/
│   ├── _components/
│   ├── _config/
│   ├── _layout/
│   ├── _styles/
│   └── [feature pages]
│
├── api/                         # Backend API routes (tRPC, webhooks)
│   ├── trpc/                    # tRPC endpoint
│   ├── auth/                    # Authentication routes
│   ├── chat/                    # Chat endpoints
│   ├── tasks/                   # Task processing (video, generation, stats)
│   ├── config/                  # Configuration endpoints
│   ├── content/                 # CMS content
│   ├── apikeys/                 # API key management
│   ├── platform/                # Platform APIs
│   ├── recommend/               # Recommendation engine
│   ├── reward/                  # Reward system
│   └── _helpers/                # Shared API utilities
│
├── _dev/                        # Development pages
│   └── images/                  # Image dev tools
│
└── _client-error/               # Client error pages
```

---

### **4. Components Directory (`/web/src/components/`) - 50 Components**

**Organized by Functionality:**

| Category | Components |
|----------|------------|
| **UI Primitives** | Button, Typography, Breadcrumb, Rate, Plural, SimpleCollapse |
| **Media** | LazyImage, LazyVideo, LazyVideoNext, VideoPlayer, LocaleMedia |
| **Forms** | Upload, UploadAudio, EnhanceTextArea, PromptInput, RichPromptInput, RichPromptInputV2 |
| **Modals** | Modal, TemplatePickerModal, PreventAutoScroll |
| **Content** | Article, RenderHTML, CommonMarkDown, Stack Previewer, Structured |
| **Icons** | CssIcon, FeatureIcon, icons/ (icon library) |
| **Navigation** | Link, NextLink, InFlowLink, RouteChangeProgress, ScrollToTop |
| **Layout** | FluentFlex, GroupNameWithDate, GlobalComponent |
| **Specialized** | SeoAnalyzer, DynamicMapbox, CanvasMenuList, I18N, ErrorBoundary |
| **Admin** | ABTestContainer, GlobalErrorHandler, GlobalComponentForDev |

---

### **5. Hooks Organization**

#### **Shared Hooks** (`/web/src/hooks/`):
- `allowGuest/` - Guest user access
- `audio/` - Audio processing
- `contactUs/` - Contact form handling
- `cookieConsent/` - Cookie management
- `formily/` - Form builder integration
- `useCustomRequest/` - HTTP requests
- `useFireworks/` - Fireworks animation
- `userGroup/` - User grouping logic
- `userPreference/` - User preferences

#### **Pollo-Specific Hooks** (`/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_hooks/`) - 62 Hooks:
- **Generation**: `useCreateSimilarVideo`, `useGeneratingVideo`, `useGeneratorFormSubmit`
- **Models**: `useModels`, `useCheckAvailableVideoModel`, `useModelFreeStatus`, `useModelMerge`
- **Templates**: `useTemplateList`, `useTemplateData`
- **Forms**: `useFormInitialValues`, `useHandleReCoverValue`, `useReviewFormDetail`
- **UI State**: `useGlobalNavStore`, `useMobile`, `useProjectSort`, `useVideoSize`
- **Tools**: `useMediaTools`, `useDragUpload`, `usePasteUpload`
- **Data**: `useModels`, `useQueryGenerationModels`, `useRegionBlock`

---

### **6. Helpers Organization**

#### **Shared Helpers** (`/web/src/helpers/`):
- `cms/` - CMS content fetching
- `format/` - String/data formatting
- `header/` - HTTP header utilities
- `i18n-temp/` - Translation handling
- `proxy/` - API proxy logic
- `server-data/` - Server-side data
- `sig/` - Signature/auth utilities

#### **Pollo-Specific Helpers** (`/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_helpers/`) - 32 Functions:
- **Models**: `createIsomorphicModels`, `isomorphicModels/` (11 model utilities)
- **Media**: `convertToJpeg`, `getMaskBase64`, `uploadImage`, `getMediaType`
- **Tools**: `tools/` directory for tool-specific helpers
- **URL**: `handleInflowUrl`, `urlParser`, `urlParamsDecode`, `getGenerateUrl`
- **Data**: `transformOptionList`, `formatCameraText`, `chat.ts`, `widgets.ts`
- **CMS**: `cms/` - Content management utilities

---

### **7. Styles Organization**

#### **Global Styles** (`/web/src/styles/`):
- `global.scss` - Global stylesheet
- `mixin.scss` - SCSS mixins
- `next-font-variables.ts` - Font variable definitions
- `next-font.ts` - Font setup

#### **Pollo-Specific Styles** (`/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_styles/`):
- `figma-theme.ts` - CRITICAL: Figma design system colors (must use `-f-` prefix)
- `figma-theme.module.scss` - Theme SCSS module
- `theme.module.scss` - Additional theme styles

**Critical Rule**: All colors MUST use `-f-` prefix (e.g., `text-f-text`, `bg-f-bg-container`, `border-f-border`)

---

### **8. Context Providers Structure**

#### **Shared Contexts** (`/web/src/contexts/`):
1. **AntdContext** - Ant Design configuration & message/notification handling
2. **AuthContext** - User authentication state
3. **PlanContext** - Subscription/plan management
4. **SiteContext** - Site-wide data
5. **SitePromotionProvider** - Promotional data
6. **SiteSpecificContext** - Brand-specific configuration
7. **ApiSubscriptionContext** - Subscription API state
8. **AppUIModalContext** - Global modal management

#### **Pollo-Specific Contexts** (`/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_context/`):
- `Form/` - Form context
- `InflowQuery/` - Inflow (generation workflow) query context

---

### **9. Path Aliases (tsconfig.json)**

```typescript
"@/*": "./src/*"                              // Root alias
"~/*": "./*"                                  // Web root alias
"@/pollo-agent/*": "./src/pages/pollo.ai/_blocks/agent/*"
"@/coco-react/analytics*": "./src/coco-react/blocks/analytics/*"
```

---

### **10. Special Directories**

#### **coco-react/** - Internal React Library:
```
coco-react/
├── blocks/
│   └── analytics/              # Analytics event system
├── components/
│   ├── button/
│   └── tabs/
├── hooks/
│   ├── use-deep-compare-async-effect/
│   ├── use-mount-idle/
│   └── use-update-deep-compare-effect/
└── lib/
    ├── add-script-to-head/     # Script injection
    ├── create-ic/              # Idle callback (replaces requestIdleCallback)

```

#### **config/** - Central Configuration:
```
config/

├── next/

├── redirects/

```

### **11. Key Configuration Files**

| File | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| `auto-imports.d.ts` | Pre-imported: React hooks, project hooks, utilities |
| `next.config.ts` | Next.js 15 config with App Router + Pages Router |
| `tailwind.config.ts` | Tailwind CSS v4 with custom theme variables |
| `lingui.config.ts` | i18n/translation configuration |
| `i18n.config.ts` | Language setup |

---

### **12. Important Architectural Patterns**

1. **Multi-Site Support**: Both `pollo.ai` and `viggle.dance` share backend code with site-specific overrides
2. **Next.js Hybrid Router**: Uses both Pages Router (legacy) and App Router (new)
3. **Page Extensions**: Only `.page.tsx`, `.page.ts`, `.page.jsx`, `.page.js` are recognized as pages
4. **Component Structure**: Heavy use of `_components`, `_hooks`, `_helpers` prefixes for site-specific code
5. **Context-Based State**: Zustand or React Context for global state
6. **Theme System**: Figma-to-CSS design tokens via `figma-theme.ts`
7. **Monorepo Structure**: Uses Turborepo with workspace dependencies
8. **Type Safety**: Strict TypeScript with no enums (use const objects or unions)

---

### **13. Entry Point Summary**

- **Main Home**: `/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/index.page.tsx`
- **App Layout**: `/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/app/layout.tsx` (App Router)
- **Global Layout**: `/web/src/pages/pollo.ai/_layout/index.tsx` (Pages Router)
- **API Routes**: `/web/src/pages/api/trpc/` (tRPC endpoint)
- **Global Providers**: `/web/src/_blocks/` (Analytics, Auth, Plan, Managements)

---

This structure reflects a modern Next.js 15 application with:
- **50+ shared components** across the platform
- **97 pollo-specific components** for feature implementation
- **62 custom hooks** in pollo.ai alone
- **Multi-brand support** with shared infrastructure
- **Strict TypeScript** with comprehensive type definitions
- **Design system integration** via Figma-to-code theme tokens
- **Enterprise-grade** authentication, subscriptions, and task management
